website_summaries.verdict: A solid bike by Diamondback that's made to perform and is a close contender to the best. A good choice if a 21 speed model fits your needs.
pros: This bike is built for speed and excellent handling, thanks to the grippy flat handlebars, 21 speeds, and durable yet lightweight frame
Owners rave about the smooth, speedy ride it provides
cons: A few reports of bikes arriving with faulty parts

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my Diamondback! My previous bike was a Trek, but it was stolen. This bike is just as great as the Trek at a much better price!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Nice hybrid
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teen daughter. She wanted road bike performance with flat handlebars and that's exactly what this bike is about. It's fast and comfortable and versatile. For those who want a solid, fast commuting bike it works terrific. I switched out the big clunky White grips that get dirty if you even look at them. Put kool stop road brake pads for better stopping ability and put on white, black silver pedals to replace the ugly black plastic ones and the bike looks as well as it performs.
customer_reviews.author: zoomservo

customer_reviews.title: Rides comfortably. The brakes required some adjusting from my local ...
customer_reviews.text: Impressed so far. Rides comfortably. The brakes required some adjusting from my local shop, and the seat had to be swapped out. But the bike itself is very nice, it's a joy to ride it. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ironman S.

customer_reviews.title: smooth ride for disc breaks seams like a sturdy item
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife who is 5'1 and she loves it. Not heavy, smooth ride for disc breaks seams like a sturdy item. Don't mind paying a couple extra dollars for quality, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: lock

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for my wife
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for my wife. I ride a DB trace. This is a well built bike that keeps up with me. Has smooth gear changes
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. Great fit and exactly what she wanted. She already has several hundred miles on it.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Knoblauch

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: I got this bike about 2 months ago, and I love it! I've had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bike is amazing, fast and attractive. I have had several compliments from professional bikers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, horribly pre-assembled.
customer_reviews.text: Pre-assembly leaves much to be desired. Great bike. Pre-assembly was less than sufficient. Inspector 26 needs to be reassigned.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bike and smooth ride
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bike and smooth ride. It's a bit bigger and bulkier than I had hoped. Easy to assenble
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my bike, very comfortable ride. Not to difficult to put together. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to disassemble and rebuild because it was not shipped assembled correctly
customer_reviews.author: jerry bowden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Easy to assembly. Excellent quality bike for the price. Can't wait to ride!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S.

customer_reviews.title: I love this bike
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, comfortable ride. Shifts easily. Only one thing U consider a con. The seat post will not go down sufficiently for my height (5'7"). My son had to cut 2 inches off the post so it would fit me. Simple fix.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy with my purchase overall
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with my purchase overall, but I did have a few minor issues. One spoke was bent when received, the tools that it stated were included were not included, and the price of the bike went down a day after my purchase, (which is always disappointing). I ordered the XS size, with 700cc tires ( I am 5'0 and it was a perfect fit). I am finding it difficult to find a back rack that fits due to small frame and large tires. Again, I see these as minor issues and ultimately very pleased, hopefully this will be helpful for others considering this bike purchase. Lightweight,cute, comfortable ride!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wheel bent
customer_reviews.text: The front wheel is bent. Is there a way I can get a new wheel vs having to send entire bike back? Other than that the bike is great. Really don't want to have to take it apart to put a new one together if just the wheel can be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Pretty.... but broken.
customer_reviews.text: The bike is aesthetically pleasing but I will never know how it rides, since both times we received this item, it came with a broken part. Perhaps these things could be fixed at a bike shop, but we had no interest in spending even more money for spare parts. It's a shame! :(
customer_reviews.author: Rebdar

customer_reviews.title: Great bike! Awful seat!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in January and I finally got a chance to ride it. Great bike but the seat is awful!!! GET A DIFFERENT SEAT! It doesn’t have a kickback stand so you’ll have to purchase that separately.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. Easily assembly, however like other reviews, the brakes were the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Diamondback Bicycles 2016 Women's Clarity 1 Complete Performance Hybrid Bike
product_meta.description: The clarity 1 could be one of the luckiest bikes on the planet: it has inherited a slew of features from our more expensive models, making it a surefire value. This bike shines in fit, ride quality, and ease of use. Combining the riding position of a mountain bike with the efficiency of a road bike, our performance hybrid platform revolves around a lightweight aluminum frame. A low stand over height makes the bike easy to get on and off, and women's-specific touch points keep you comfortable on longer rides-the seat feels right and the handlebars are just where you want them. Smooth-rolling 700c road wheels and 21 gears keep your speed up on rides of any length, from trips to the store to weekend bike path excursions.
feature_bullets: Hand built Devine Designs 6061-T6 aluminum alloy frame is durable and comfortably compliant
Integrated aero high tensile steel straight blade fork delivers quick, confident handling
Shimano 21-speed drivetrain provides gears for any terrain
Frame and fork eyelets easily let you mount rack and fenders
